# logentries-postman-collection

Try out the Logentries REST API using Postman with this ready-made Postman collection.

# Quick Start

[![Run in Postman](https://run.pstmn.io/button.svg)](https://app.getpostman.com/run-collection/951fae0f0df62e51e0e2#?env%5BLogentries-example-environment.template%)

Just click on the link above to get started, after importing the collection into Postman, you'll need to fill in some environment variables.

1. Click on the cog in the top right corner of your Postman window
2. Click on "Manage Environments"
3. Click on "Logentries example environment"
4. Go to the Logentries API key page in your browser: https://logentries.com/app/#/user-account/apikey
5. Fill out the values for each key in Postman.

# Manual installation

You can also install this collection manually by downloading the json files in this repo and importing them into Postman using the import feature.

Just download the file, and click on "Import" in the top left corner of Postman.
